name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForEndStageRenalDisease
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for End stage Renal Disease
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to end stage renal disease and is listed as a renal disorder on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes end stage renal disease, which is also classified as stage 5 chronic kidney disease. It includes dual-diagnosis terms (e.g., Hypertensive heart AND chronic kidney disease stage 5) and stage 5 CKD with complications.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes congenital renal failure.)
